title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Paul Pogba start the year hilariously "cold" as the Man United superstars share an ice bath
text:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Paul Pogba start the year hilariously "cold" as the Man United superstars share an ice bath Two of the world's most expensive players shared an insight into the realities of their recovery Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Paul Pogba posts hilarious 'Pogbahimovic ice bath' video Share this video Get Manchester United FC   
While Paul Pogba and Zlatan Ibrahimovic are on fire by mere mortals' standards at the moment, they enter 2017 "cold". 
Far from the glamour of their gazillion-a-week salaries, there is nothing fancy about their recovery rituals during this hectic time of the year. 
Pogba shared an insight into the Manchester United superstars' New Year's Day programme, as they deal with a tough turnaround from New Year's Eve's win over Boro to today's clash at West Ham. 
"This guys will kill me one day," he said in the caption of a video posted on Instagram before calling on Ibra to address his 11.6million followers. 
"Zlatan, what do you say today?" 
The Swede responds: "Happy New Year to all of you, we begin 2017 cold!" Paul Pogba posted a video with Zlatan Ibrahimovic "We begin 2017 cold!" Zlatan says 
Although showing his considerable sense of humour here, Ibrahimovic has labelled the Christmas/New Year fixture schedule as “crazy”. 
“I think it’s crazy," he said of United playing just 48 hours after their hard-fought win over Middlesbrough. 
"Let’s be intelligent and realistic. For the health and for every individual and for the physical part of the point of view for everyone that is in the game, you need rest. 
“There’s no superman. There’s no strength that can recover from a game so fast, and I cannot do anything about it. If the coach wants me to play, I’ll play. 
“I feel good, but let’s be realistic. 
"From a game, you need two or three days to recover. We’ve just recovered from the last game, played again and we have another game within 48 hours, so let’s be intelligent and recover good.” Like us on Facebook
